title: Premium shall not be charged for exclusion of staircase and lift well etc
clause_text: Premium shall not be charged for exclusion of staircase and lift well etc. as covered under the provisions of Regulation No 31(1)
section: Relaxation in Building and other requirements:-

source_pdf.text_snippet: Premium shall not be charged for exclusion of staircase and lift well etc. as covered under the provisions of Regulation No 31(1)
